{"id":578796239,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1635471223,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/578796239/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Integers by The Power Value","memory":"9.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int>dp;\n    int val(int x){\n        if(x==1) return 0;\n        if(x<=1000 && dp[x]!=-1 ) return dp[x];\n        if(x%2) return x<=1000?dp[x]=val(3*x+1)+1:val(3*x+1)+1;\n        else return x<=1000?dp[x]=val(x/2)+1:val(x/2)+1;\n    }\n    int getKth(int lo, int hi, int k) {\n        dp=vector<int>(1001,-1);\n        priority_queue<pair<int,int>>pq;\n        for(int i=lo;i<=hi;i++){\n            pq.push({val(i),i});\n            if(pq.size()>k) pq.pop();            \n        }\n        return pq.top().second;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-integers-by-the-power-value"}
